abilityEffect: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and and then shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent does the same.

effect.en: You may discard a [R] or [F] basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a [R] Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If you discard a [F] Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
